transcript: introducing AI people a generative AI sandbox that enables players to experience interactions with autonomous NPCs through text or voice input there are no fixed plots NPC's choices and emotions craft emerging stories they adapt to players the environment and fellow NPCs while maintaining consistency through long-term memory Unleash Your creativity with the integrated editor shaping NPC's lives and crafting unlimited narratives or enjoy pre-made and community-made stories driven by Ai and user content each game session is a fresh original constantly evolving narrative Journey the players can choose between online and local large language models to power the NPCs what story will you create today

key_facts: AI People is a generative AI sandbox for interactive storytelling.
Players interact with autonomous NPCs using text or voice input.
NPCs have no fixed plots and generate choices dynamically.
NPCs adapt to players, environment, and other NPCs in real time.
Long-term memory ensures consistency across narrative sessions.
The platform includes an integrated editor for customizing NPC lives.
Users can create unlimited original narratives using the editor.
Pre-made stories are available for immediate play.
Community-made content is supported and integrated into gameplay.
Each game session generates a unique, evolving narrative.
Players can choose between online and local large language models.
AI powers both NPC behavior and story progression.
Narratives emerge from player-NPC interactions and environmental changes.
Autonomous NPCs maintain emotional continuity over time.
User-generated content drives diverse story experiences.
Voice input is supported for NPC interaction.
Text input is supported for NPC interaction.
No predetermined endings exist in any session.
Story development is continuous and non-linear.
NPCs exhibit independent decision-making based on context.
key_opinions: The sandbox offers unparalleled creative freedom for users.
Dynamic NPCs make each playthrough feel fresh and personal.
Long-term memory enhances immersion through consistent character arcs.
The integrated editor empowers users to shape complex narratives.
Community-made stories enrich the overall experience.
Local LLMs provide better privacy and control over data.
Online LLMs offer more advanced AI capabilities.
Voice input significantly improves engagement with NPCs.
Emergent storytelling surpasses traditional scripted games.
The lack of fixed plots encourages deeper exploration and experimentation.
key_datapoints: Each game session is a fresh, original narrative.
NPCs adapt to player actions, environment, and fellow NPCs.
Supports both text and voice input for interaction.
Users can select between online and local LLMs.
Integrated editor enables full customization of NPC lives.
Pre-made stories are available at launch.
No fixed plots or predetermined endings exist.
Player choice directly influences story direction.
NPCs exhibit emotional responses that persist over time.
Multiple story paths emerge from single interactions.
User content drives ongoing narrative diversity.
Session length varies based on player engagement.
